statements: DELETE FROM medical_inventory WHERE quantity <= 10 AND storage_location = 'Main Storage';
DELETE FROM medical_inventory WHERE id = 100 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM medical_inventory WHERE storage_location = 'Warehouse' AND item_name = 'Bandages';
DELETE FROM Medical_Equipment WHERE manufacturer='ABC Company';

DELETE FROM Medical_Supplies WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM Medical_Equipment WHERE serial_number = 'SN1234';
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE status = 'Out of Service';
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE status = 'Not Available';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE supply_id = 1 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE status = 'In Use' AND location = 'Room A';
